sentence.Network_en: So that it results in the change of the rotatory direction.
sentence.Network_cn: 构象的变化改变了分子内的螺旋方向,因此,旋光方向随之改变.

sentence.Network_en: It isolate vibrations from axial, transverse and rotatory orientation.
sentence.Network_cn: 橡胶隔振器不仅在轴向, 而且在横向及回转方向具有隔振性能.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To provide anatomical data for the pathological mechanism of atlantoaxial rotatory deformity in children.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨小儿寰枢椎旋转畸形发病机制的解剖学依据.
